mapper.insert: insert into User(id, password, role, name, email, type, addr, phone_num, business_num, point) values(#{id}, #{password}, #{role}, #{name}, #{email}, #{type}, #{addr}, #{phoneNum}, #{businessNum}, #{point})
mapper.select: select id, password, role, name, email, type, addr, phone_num as phoneNum, business_num as businessNum, point from User where id = #{id}
